title: (x) Suite magazine - by Inigo Jerez {David H}
author: DagBrandsaeter

comments.content: Well the S appears to have been customly neutered. The logo probably based on a font but I don't know which one right now.

thanks a lot for your help!   
really appreciate it.

Ah, neat. But as mentioned in the other thread.   
What an obnoxious [website](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019040422/http:/www.textaxis.com/) that fella has. It actually made me a little bit angry.   
   
So does this mean that the logo is completely   
custom made?   
I would guess he has made it himself as he apparently is making fonts.

No, man. It is a totally hopeless site. Whenever you think you are going to view some font you are tricked as some new and irritating button shows up to mock you.   
And I think I might need therapy to help me off this rage now built up inside of me.   
   
Dang ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019040422im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) diggety
I lasted at that site about 30 seconds, unbelieveably bad
All the more irritating since I'd really like to see his fonts.

> * * *
> **quote:**
> 
> It actually made me a little bit angry.
> 
> * * *
> !-/quote-!\>!-quote-!\>

Thank _God_ you felt that way too. I was beginning to think I needed therapy. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019040422im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
